includedAssets.title: Within
includedAssets.synopsis: New Deputy Director Kersh assigns Agent John Doggett to head up Mulder's manhunt, where he fails to endear himself to Scully.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New Deputy Director Kersh assigns Agent John Doggett to head up Mulder's manhunt, where he fails to endear himself to Scully.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: New Deputy Director Kersh assigns Agent John Doggett to head up Mulder's manhunt, where he fails to endear himself to Scully.

includedAssets.title: Without
includedAssets.synopsis: Scully heads to Arizona to continue her search for Mulder, while Kersh informs Skinner that he is, officially, Mulder's successor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scully heads to Arizona to continue her search for Mulder, while Kersh informs Skinner that he is, officially, Mulder's successor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scully heads to Arizona to continue her search for Mulder, while Kersh informs Skinner that he is, officially, Mulder's successor.

includedAssets.title: Patience
includedAssets.synopsis: Doggett tackles his first X-Files investigation, involving a string of gruesome deaths and a bloodthirsty, bat-like creature.

includedAssets.title: Roadrunners
includedAssets.synopsis: When Scully refuses Doggett's help, she finds herself trapped in a small town with a deadly secret.

includedAssets.title: Invocation
includedAssets.synopsis: Doggett and Scully investigate when a boy who disappeared ten years ago returns, having not aged one bit.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Doggett and Scully investigate when a boy who disappeared ten years ago returns, having not aged one bit.

includedAssets.title: Redrum
includedAssets.synopsis: A lawyer wakes up in prison, about to be prosecuted for his wife's murder, a murder he can't remember committing.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A lawyer wakes up in prison, about to be prosecuted for his wife's murder, a murder he can't remember committing.

includedAssets.synopsis: Without Scully's assistance, Doggett and Skinner pursue a deadly cult leader who claims his victims while they're sleeping.

includedAssets.synopsis: Doggett takes on a case Mulder was investigating before he disappeared, involving a monster from Native American lore.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Doggett takes on a case Mulder was investigating before he disappeared, involving a monster from Native American lore.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: There are big changes in store in the landmark sci-fi drama’s eighth season. With Mulder gone, Scully must learn to work as part of a new team. Gillian Anderson and Robert Patrick star.

includedIn.title: The X-Files
includedIn.synopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder, while an unexplained force works to thwart the duo’s efforts.
